author: Bruno Blanes
name: PatchNotesParser
description: A set of useful commands for parsing League of Legends patch notes.
short: A League of Legends patch notes parser.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing PatchNotesParser! XD

This COG stores a JSON file called `designer_icons.json`.
It also requires the following libraries to work: `bs4, typing, requests, rivercogutils` (https://github.com/RheingoldRiver/rivercogutils).
It does a few GET requests to https://leagueoflegends.com and https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com to get all the data needed for parsing.

Please do set the default bug report channel by using `[p]pnparser set bugreportchannel <channel_id>`.
To parse use `[p]pnparser parse all <patch_notes_version>` or type `[p]pnparser help` to see all available commands.
